Package org.forgerock.openam.saml2

Class IDPSSOFederateRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.saml2.IDPSSOFederateRequest
  • public class IDPSSOFederateRequest
extends Object
    Represents the data necessary for a request to be handled by the IdP SSO Federate's authenticate and authentication lookup systems, as well as all related utility functions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      IDPSSOFederateRequest​(String reqID, String realm, SAML2IdentityProviderAdapter idpAdapter, String idpMetaAlias, String idpEntityID)
      Data necessary for either authentication or authentication lookup via SAML2 IdP.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IDPSSOFederateRequest

        public IDPSSOFederateRequest​(String reqID,
                             String realm,
                             SAML2IdentityProviderAdapter idpAdapter,
                             String idpMetaAlias,
                             String idpEntityID)
        Data necessary for either authentication or authentication lookup via SAML2 IdP.
        Parameters:
        reqID - Request identifier.
        realm - The realm we're operating in.
        idpAdapter - The IdP adapter to use.
        idpMetaAlias - The meta alias to use.
        idpEntityID - The IdP's entity ID.
